Module roborally
Package client.view

Class LobbyController

java.lang.Object
client.view.Controller
client.view.LobbyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Updatable
public class LobbyController
extends Controller
implements Updatable
This class displays the joined and ready users and already has the possibility to chat with other users
Author:
sarah, louis, simon

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane chatPane
    The chatPane contains the whole chat application.
    private javafx.scene.control.Label infoLabel
    The label which displays errors.
    private static org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger  
    private javafx.scene.image.ImageView mapImageView
    The mapImageView shows if someone has already chose a map.
    private javafx.scene.control.Label mapLabel
    The mapLabel displays the name of the chosen map.
    private javafx.scene.layout.Pane mapSelectionPane
    The mapSelectionPane shows the possibility to choose between available maps, it is only visible for the first player if his status is ready.
    private javafx.scene.layout.Pane overlayPane
    This Pane darkens the window, sets the focus on the mapSelectionPane and contains it.
    private javafx.scene.layout.FlowPane playerIconPane
    The playerIconPane which contains all different vBoxes of players.
    private java.util.HashMap<Player,​javafx.scene.layout.VBox> playerIcons
    HashMap with a player and its related VBox.
    private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox readyCheckbox
    The checkBox for the player to set its status.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addJoinedPlayer​(Player player)
    This method displays an user who joined to the lobby with its chosen robot, name and also the name is added to the ChoiceBox so that other users in lobby can send (direct) messages.
    void attachChatPane​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane chat)
    This method sets the chat in the chatPane with its width and height.
    private void checkBoxAction()
    By clicking the ready checkbox a message will be send to the client (and then to the server) to signal the ready status of the user.
    private void displayStatus​(PlayerStatus playerStatus)
    The robot image of the user who clicked the ready button gets changed.
    javafx.scene.control.CheckBox getReadyCheckbox()  
    void mapSelected​(java.lang.String map)
    This method gets called if the player selects a map than the protocol MapSelected gets send and the pane for choosing a map gets invisible
    void removePlayer​(Player player)
    This method removes a player from the lobby by exiting.
    void resetFocus()
    This method sets the focus onto the infoLabel
    private void showMapView​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> availableMaps)
    This method shows the innerView mapView and sets the available maps, also it sets the overlayPane to visible, so that the player is able to choose a map.
    void update​(JSONMessage message)
    This method overwrites the method from Client and handles the JSONMessage from the server that are for the LobbyController and handles them.

      public void attachChatPane​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane chat)
      This method sets the chat in the chatPane with its width and height.

    • addJoinedPlayer

      public void addJoinedPlayer​(Player player)
      This method displays an user who joined to the lobby with its chosen robot, name and also the name is added to the ChoiceBox so that other users in lobby can send (direct) messages.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who joins

    • displayStatus

      private void displayStatus​(PlayerStatus playerStatus)
      The robot image of the user who clicked the ready button gets changed. Now the icon has a pink background to signal the ready status.
      Parameters:
      playerStatus - if the player is ready or not

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(Player player)
      This method removes a player from the lobby by exiting.
      Parameters:
      player - that exits

    • update

      public void update​(JSONMessage message)
      This method overwrites the method from Client and handles the JSONMessage from the server that are for the LobbyController and handles them.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Updatable
      Parameters:
      message - that the player received from the server for the lobby

    • showMapView

      private void showMapView​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> availableMaps)
      This method shows the innerView mapView and sets the available maps, also it sets the overlayPane to visible, so that the player is able to choose a map.
      Parameters:
      availableMaps - all available maps the player can choose from

    • mapSelected

      public void mapSelected​(java.lang.String map)
      This method gets called if the player selects a map than the protocol MapSelected gets send and the pane for choosing a map gets invisible
      Parameters:
      map - The map the player chose

    • checkBoxAction

      private void checkBoxAction()
      By clicking the ready checkbox a message will be send to the client (and then to the server) to signal the ready status of the user.
